title: Swarna Rekha Bangles: Delicate Gold & Diamond Embrace
materials: meticulously crafted with a signature Hyderabadi polish. Adorned with brilliant-cut Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones
features: These bangles feature a flowing, wave-inspired design. Each bangle is a slender 'Rekha' (line) of gold, delicately curving and set with sparkling CZ stones at intervals. The open design allows for comfortable wear and adds a modern touch to a traditional form. Crafted with precision and high-quality finish.
colors: Predominantly warm gold with the brilliant white sparkle of the Cubic Zirconia.
occasions: or as a sophisticated addition to formal attire. Suitable for gifting during festivals like Diwali or Sankranthi
or as a token of appreciation for any occasion.
description: Embrace elegance with these exquisitely crafted bangles. The flowing design and sparkling CZ stones create a mesmerizing visual appeal. These are lightweight and comfortable for everyday wear, while the 22K gold and expert craftsmanship ensure lasting quality. A modern take on a classic style, these bangles are versatile and timeless.
